mapper.select: select (select count(*) from ADM_LICENSE where SYNC_DATE like CONCAT(#{syncDate},'%')) as ADM_LICENSE, (select count(*) from ADM_PENALTY where SYNC_DATE like CONCAT(#{syncDate},'%')) as ADM_PENALTY, (select count(*) from MOD_COMPANY where SYNC_DATE like CONCAT(#{syncDate},'%')) as MOD_COMPANY, (select count(*) from CREDIT_COMMITMENT_2022 where SYNC_DATE like CONCAT(#{syncDate},'%')) as CREDIT_COMMITMENT_2022, (select count(*) from T_CREDIT_OBJECTION_APPEAL_APPLY where SYNC_DATE like CONCAT(#{syncDate},'%')) as T_CREDIT_OBJECTION_APPEAL_APPLY, (select count(*) from T_CREDIT_REPAIR_APPLY where SYNC_DATE like CONCAT(#{syncDate},'%')) as T_CREDIT_REPAIR_APPLY, (select count(*) from T_CREDIT_REPORT_APPLY where SYNC_DATE like CONCAT(#{syncDate},'%')) as T_CREDIT_REPORT_APPLY, (select count(*) from T_CREDIT_REVIEW_APPLY where SYNC_DATE like CONCAT(#{syncDate},'%')) as T_CREDIT_REVIEW_APPLY
